description.plain:
Meduza is an Italian producer trio, existing of Mattia Vitale (Matt), Simone Giani (Simon) and Luca de Gregorio (Lucas). The trio rose to fame with their house single “Piece Of Your Heart”  featuring the Britsh pop trio Goodboys. The track, released on February 1st, 2019, peaked at number two on the UK Singles Chart and topped the US Dance Club Songs chart.

A few months later, in July 2019, they released “Using”, a remix of RITUAL & Emily Warren’s song. Their second single, “Lose Control” featuring Becky Hill  and Goodboys is produced in a similar fashion as the first track. The single reached number 15 of the UK Singles Chart.

In an interview with Change Underground, Matt explained how the group came together:

We’re a team of three guys with the same passion: Matt, Simon and Luke. Me (Matt), I grew up with the music inside my mind everyday, my dad was a DJ in the 70’s and a big fan of rock and funk music, Simon studied as a pianist at the music conservatory in Milan, Luke grew up studying piano from the age of 6. After that we all started dj-ing in our country for a few years and each of us started producing electronic music separately. Until we decided to team up in 2014 starting making music and writing together.

body.plain:
Meduza is an Italian producer trio, existing of Mattia Vitale (Matt), Simone Giani (Simon) and Luca de Gregorio (Lucas). The trio rose to fame with their house single “Piece Of Your Heart”  featuring the Britsh pop trio Goodboys. The track, released on February 1st, 2019, peaked at number two on the UK Singles Chart and topped the US Dance Club Songs chart.

A few months later, in July 2019, they released “Using”, a remix of RITUAL & Emily Warren’s song. Their second single, “Lose Control” featuring Becky Hill  and Goodboys is produced in a similar fashion as the first track. The single reached number 15 of the UK Singles Chart.

In an interview with Change Underground, Matt explained how the group came together:

We’re a team of three guys with the same passion: Matt, Simon and Luke. Me (Matt), I grew up with the music inside my mind everyday, my dad was a DJ in the 70’s and a big fan of rock and funk music, Simon studied as a pianist at the music conservatory in Milan, Luke grew up studying piano from the age of 6. After that we all started dj-ing in our country for a few years and each of us started producing electronic music separately. Until we decided to team up in 2014 starting making music and writing together.

songs.full_title: Piece of Your Heart by Meduza (Ft. Goodboys)
songs.title: Piece of Your Heart

description.plain:
They said about this song:
https://change-underground.com/meduza-on-the-success-of-piece-of-your-heart

“We knew Goodboys thanks to a common friend who sent us some of their stuff, after a year we decided to meet us in a studio in London working on a session all together in one room, after working on ¾ tracks we decided to have a break and have some fun writing something different, something not standard for the scene, and that was the right moment when we wrote the first verse and chorus of Piece of your heart, everyone in the studio from the team was shocked at first listen at the end of the week. It wasn’t deliberate, the microphone was recording when he did that, we thought it was cool and put it in for fun.”

songs.lyrics:
31 ContributorsPiece of Your Heart Lyrics[Verse]
Show me a piece of your heart, a piece of your love
I'm calling you up to gettin' down, down, down
The way that we touch is never enough
I'm turning you up to gettin' down, down
Show me a piece of your heart, a piece of your love
I'm calling you up to gettin' down, down, down
The way that we touch is never enough
I'm turning you up to gettin' down, down, down

[Break]
What? Sorry, just quickly
What if it's da, da, da, uh, uh
Da, da, da, uh, uh
Down, down, down

[Chorus]
Uh, da, da, da, uh, uh
Da, da, da, uh, uh
Da, da, da, uh, uh
Da, da, da
Uh, da, da, da, uh, uh
Da, da, da, uh, uh
Da, da, da, uh, uh
Down, down, down
You might also like[Post-Chorus]
Show me a piece of you, show me a part of you
I'll be what you want
And if it's physical, keep it subliminal
Show me what you want
Show me a piece of you, show me a part of you
I'll be what you want
And if it's physical, keep it subliminal
Show me what you want

[Verse]
Show me a piece of your heart, a piece of your love
I'm calling you up to gettin' down, down, down
The way that we touch is never enough
I'm turning you up to gettin' down, down, down

[Interlude]
Da, da, da, uh, uh
Da, da, da, uh, uh
Da, da, da, uh, uh
Down, down, down

[Chorus]
Uh, da, da, da, uh, uh
Da, da, da, uh, uh
Da, da, da, uh, uh
Da, da, da
Uh, da, da, da, uh, uh
Da, da, da, uh, uh
Da, da, da, uh, uh
Down, down, down
[Post-Chorus]
Show me a piece of you, show me a part of you
I'll be what you want
And if it's physical, keep it subliminal
Show me what you want10Embed

Mm, mm

Learn to be brave, see the other side

songs.lyrics:
22 ContributorsTell It to My Heart Lyrics[Verse 1]
I can't work you out
Are you thinkin' 'bout somethin' better?
Holdin' on to you
While you drag me through stormy weather
The only time you smile is in the photographs
And when I pull you close it's like you're holdin' back
Before we turn to strangers tryna love in the dark

[Pre-Chorus]
Tell it to my heart
'Cause I can't keep guessing if it's me you're missing?
Tell it to my heart
'Cause the sound of silence is a place we're dying

[Chorus]
Tell it to my heart, heart, oh-ah
Tell it to my heart, hеart, oh-ah

[Post-Chorus]
Tell it to my heart
'Cause I can't keep guеssing if it's me you're missing?
Tell it to my heart
'Cause the sound of silence is a place we're dying
Tell it to my heart
You might also like[Verse 2]
Before a light goes out
Come and tell me now if something's fadin'
'Cause I can feel it in every single thing that you're not sayin'
You move close to me but I can feel the space
Whatever time we have I'm not gonna waste
Before we turn to strangers tryna love in the dark

[Pre-Chorus]
Tell it to my heart
'Cause I can't keep guessing if it's me you're missing?
Tell it to my heart
'Cause the sound of silence

[Chorus]
Tell it to my heart, heart, oh-ah
Tell it to my heart, heart, oh-ah

[Post-Chorus]
Tell it to my heart
'Cause I can't keep guessing if it's me you're missing?
Tell it to my heart
'Cause the sound of silence is a place we're dying
Tell it to my heart3Embed
